name: Tombstone Mystery
description:
You as an explorer board this mysterious ship. It is a ship that turns out to be a graveyard. There is a treasure to be found in this ship. A voice is heard that tells you what you can do to find the treasure. Determine when the voice is deceiving you, and when it tells the truth.

Press V to read the text in game.

Character Design- Wolfer122

Environment&Programming- TwistedHawk

Programmer-Masterbagel
